about_the_game:
It's the music album of Dream 4 You.
Dream 4 You(D4U) is an Japanese character and artist group
whose lineup comprised Kaoru Hayano as MISAKI,Yuuka Ueno as TSUKASA,Misaki Suzuki as AZUMI,Yuubi Midorikawa as KARIN,Yui Hasegawa as RIKO.
18 songs used by the video game：Song of Memories.

■Tracklist(D4U's songs):


01,maze
02,Resolve
03,Singing breeze
04,subliminal melody
05,Beyond The Wave
06,奇跡の水面
07,睡蓮のラビリンス
08,Cheer up
09,二人のシンフォニア
10,君だけのサンシャイン
11,君の元へ
12,Dream Vision
13,Trail Contrail
14,Save the Soul
15,LIGHTNING HEART
16,雷鼓
17,Song of Memories
18,continue or not


mp3/160kbps
This DLC is saved on the game file.
